Uses of Interface
xtc.lang.cpp.Stream

Packages that use Stream
xtc.lang.cpp This package implements the SuperC parsing engine for parsing all of C. 
 

Uses of Stream in xtc.lang.cpp
 

Classes in xtc.lang.cpp that implement Stream
 class HeaderFileManager
          This class manages the lexing of input files as well as finding headers.
static class HeaderFileManager.CLexerStream
          This class wraps the lexer in a Stream
static class HeaderFileManager.DirectiveStream
          This class collects the tokens of preprocessor directives
 class Preprocessor
          This class expands macros and processes header files
protected static class Preprocessor.MacroContext
          A token context that contains the tokens from a macro expansion.
protected static class Preprocessor.MultipleMacro
          The macro context of a multiply-defined macro.
protected static class Preprocessor.SingleMacro
          The token context for singly-defined macro.
protected static class Preprocessor.SyntaxContext
          A token context that produces a stream of tokens from a buffer.
protected static class Preprocessor.TokenContext
          A token context class.
 class TokenFilter
          A stream that filters out all tokens except for regular and compound tokens.
 

Fields in xtc.lang.cpp declared as Stream

          The stream from which the Preprocessor gets tokens and directives
protected  Stream HeaderFileManager.PFile.stream
          The stream of tokens from the header.
 Stream HeaderFileManager.Computed.stream
          The current stream of tokens.
protected  Stream ForkMergeParser.stream
          The stream from which the parser gets syntactic units
 Stream ForkMergeParser.OrderedSyntax.stream
          The stream from which to pull syntax

          The stack of streams.
